description: Wonderchat is a no-code chatbot platform that lets you deploy AI-powered chatbots for websites quickly.

actions.name: addPage
actions.description: Add new pages to your chatbot’s knowledge base.

actions.name: addTag
actions.description: Add custom tags to a specific chatlog.

actions.name: askQuestion
actions.description: Sends a question to a Wonderchat bot; returns the bot’s answer.

actions.name: removeTag
actions.description: Remove specific tags from a chatlog.

triggers.name: newUserMessage
